short_description_localized.en: Escape the cold and enjoy Florida's beautiful weather and many attractions with this incredibly priced package.

description_localized.en: Escape the cold and enjoy Florida's beautiful weather and many attractions with this incredibly priced package. Located just 1.5 miles from the Walt Disney World® theme parks. Scheduled shuttle service available.

addons_override: Buy 3 nights, get the 4th night free

description_override_localized.en:
Escape the cold and enjoy Florida's beautiful weather and many attractions with this incredibly priced package.   

  • Buy 3 nights, get the 4th night free
  • Receive one extra large "favorite combinations" pizza from Vista Bistro 1pm late checkout
  • Plus, our daily signature hot breakfast buffet and parking are always FREE!
  • Travel Dates December 1, 2019 - March 31, 2020
  • Located just 1.5 miles from the Walt Disney World® theme parks. Scheduled shuttle service available.
